title: North Korea Conducts Ninth Weapons Test of the Year
sub_head: Apparent ballistic missile launch draws Japanese condemnation, comes days before South Korean presidential election
body:
SEOUL—North Korea has launched a suspected ballistic missile off its east coast on Saturday local time, South Korean and Japanese officials said, as Pyongyang continues its recent spree of weapons activity.
The missile was fired at 8:48 a.m. from the North’s Sunan region, which is located just outside Pyongyang, Seoul’s military said. It had a steep trajectory, hitting an altitude of about 340 miles and traveling about 185 miles before splashing into the waters between Korea and Japan, according to an initial Tokyo assessment.
